welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nagoya, Japan! Get ready to experience the perfect blend of traditional and modern culture, delicious local cuisine, and the city's famous historical sites. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Nagoya has to offer.

restaurants.name: 肉うどん さんすけ
restaurants.description: 肉うどん さんすけ is a udon restaurant located in 名古屋市.
restaurants.address: 中区丸の内2-8-30 (竹中ビル 1F), 名古屋市, 愛知県, 460-0002

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komaki AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Komaki AFB Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal for low-cost carriers.
